rukus.text: Ware wa izen iburahimu ni, hoseina okonai o sazuketa. Ware wa kare o yoku shitte iru
Kare ga chichi to kare no hitobito ni, ko itta toki o omoi nasai. `Anata gataga suhai suru korera no guzo wa, nani monodearu no ka
Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, sosen ga sorera o suhai suru no o mimashita
Kare wa itta. `Anata gata to anata gata no sosen wa, akiraka ni ayamatte ita nodearu
Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata wa shinri o motarashita nodesu ka. Soretomo tawamureru-shana nodesu ka
Kare wa itta. `Sode wanai. Anata gata no omo wa, ten to ji no omo. (Mu kara) sorera (tenchi) o sozo sa reta katadearu. Soshite watashi wa sore ni taisuru shonin no hitoridearu
Arra ni chikatte, watashi wa anata gataga se o mukete satta nochi ni, anata gata no guzo ni hitotsu no saku o megurasou
Koshite kare wa, kanarazu kare-ra ga soko ni kaette kurudearou to (omotte), yuiitsu-tai no kyozo o nozoki sorera o tataki kowashita
Kare-ra wa itta. `Dare ga watashi-tachi no kamigami o koshita nodeshou ka. Hontoni kare wa fugina monodesu
(Aru mono ga) itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, iburahimu to iu wakamono ga, sono katagata o hihan suru no o kiita
Kare-ra wa itta. `Sorenara, sono-sha o hitobito no me no mae ni hikidase. Kanarazu mina ga shogen surudeshou
Iburahimu yo, anatana nodesu ka. Watashi-tachi no kamigami ni taishi ko no yona koto o shita no wa.' To ichido wa itta
Kare wa (kotaete),`iya, iya, sorera no naka no kono oki (guzo) ga sore o shita nodesu. Kare-ra ga kuchi ga kikeru mononara kiite mi nasai.' To itta
Soko de kare-ra wa, mizukara (ryoshin ni) kaerimite (kokoro ni) itta. `Tashikani anata gata (jishin) ga warui nodesu
Kan o oite, kare-ra wa mata hon'i shi (te i~tsu)ta. `Anata wa korera (kamigami) no,-guchi ga kikenai no o yoku shitte imashita
Iburahimu wa itta. `Sorenara anata gata wa, arra igai no mono o suhai suru nodesu ka. Anata gata o, sukoshi mo ekisezu mata son wa nai mono o
A, nasakenai kotodesu. Anata gata mo, anata gataga arra o sashioite suhai suru mono-tachi mo. Anata gata wa, nao satoranai nodesu ka
Kare-ra wa itta. `Dose yarunara, kare o yaki nasai. Soshite anata gata no kamigami o sukui nasai
(Sonotoki) ware wa meirei shita. `Hi yo, tsumetaku nare. Iburahimu no ue ni heian'are
Kare-ra wa kare ni taishi sakudo shiyou to shitaga, ware wa kare-ra o hidoi shippai-sha ni shita
Ware wa kare to (sono oi no) ruto o, ban'yu no tame ni ware ga shukufuku shita ji ni sukuidashita
Soshite kare ni (ko no) isuhaku o sazuke, mata sono-jo no tamamono to shite (mago no) yaakobu o sazuketa. Ware wa sorezore o, tadashi mono ni shita

Ware wa kare-ra o, waga meirei o hojite (hitobito o) michibiku doshi to shi, kare-ra ni zenko ni hagemi, reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o suru yo keiji shita. Soshite kare-ra wa isshokenmei ni ware ni tsukaeta
Mata ware wa ruto ni handan-ryoku to eichi to o sazuke, katsu harenchina okonai ni fukeru machi kara, kare o sukuidashita. Kare-ra wa,-nushi no okite ni somuku jaakuna mindeatta
Kare (ruto) o ware no jihi ni hitara seta. Hontoni kare wa tadashi monodeatta
